name: Type The Entire Of Ulysses. That's it. That's the game.
name_original: Type The Entire Of Ulysses. That's it. That's the game.
description:
Finally, a typing game with the entire of James Joyce's Ulysses in it. In "Type The Entire Of Ulysses. That's It. That's The Game." you will type out Ulysses and pretty much nothing else.

But why?

I made this for the "This Game is Way Too Long" jam and I quite like Ulysses.

Who in the right mind would play this?

It could be you! I mean people play Desert Bus, why not this?

Hot Keys

  • Ctrl + P - Pause
  • Tab - show/hide stats (in game)
  • Ctrl + F - Full screen
  • Ctrl + S - Skip current music track

Other Stuff

Technical note: This game involves some pretty heavy string processing and loading times may be slow (About 2 minutes for extremely long chapters - I'm looking at you, Chapter 15).

This game is a mod of my game, A Relaxing Typing Game.
